articles.title: Blue Origin Announces Crew For New Shepard’s 31st Mission - Blue Origin
articles.description: New Shepard’s 11th human flight, NS-31, will launch this spring with Aisha Bowe, Amanda Nguyen, Gayle King, Katy Perry, Kerianne Flynn, and Lauren Sánchez.
